required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Plasma Glucose Kinetics and Cereal Product Content in Slowly Digestible Starch (SDS) in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Plasma Glucose Kinetics Following Ingestion of Two Cereal Products With a Different Content in Slowly Digestible Starch (SDS) in Healthy Males and Females

collaborator.agency: Institut de Recherches Cliniques de Montreal
Centre de Recherche en Nutrition Humaine Rhone-Alpe

brief_summary.textblock: The present study aims at investigating the effect of ingesting 2 cereal products differing by their SDS content on the kinetics of glucose in healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock:
The present study will compare the effect of consuming cereal products alone on :
- the rates of appearance and disappearance of exogenous and total glucose
- the glycemic and insulinemic responses
- the postprandial GIP concentrations

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of appearance of exogenous glucose (RaE)

secondary_outcome.description: iAUC of RaE over selected intervals over the 300-minute postprandial period

secondary_outcome.measure: kinetics of Rate of disappearance of exogenous glucose (RdE), Rate of appearance of total glucose (RaT), Rate of disappearance of total glucose (RdT) and Endogenous glucose production (EGP)
secondary_outcome.description: Postprandial kinetics of RdE, RaT, RdT and EGP

secondary_outcome.measure: iAUC of RdE, RaT, RdT and EGP
secondary_outcome.description: iAUC of RdE, RaT and RdT and dAUC of EGP over selected intervals over the 300-minute postprandial period
Pre- and postprandial kinetics of glycemia and insulinemia
iAUC of glycemia and insulinemia over selected intervals over the 300-minute postprandial period

secondary_outcome.measure: Kinetics of plasma glucose-dependent insulinotropic peptide (GIP) concentration

secondary_outcome.description: iAUC of GIP over selected intervals over the 300-minute postprandial period
dAUC of FFA over selected intervals over the 300-minute postprandial period

arm_group.description: Biscuit with high Slowly Digestible Starch content
Cereal product with low Slowly Digestible Starch content

intervention.description: acute evaluation of the effect of ingestion of cereal products differing by their Slowly Digestible Starch content

overall_official.affiliation: Institut de Recherches Cliniques de Montreal

facility.name: Institut de Recherches Cliniques de Montréal
